# Wednesday, May 15, 2024

First day of the AI conference. Attended several interesting talks.

## Morning Session

Dr. Smith gave an excellent keynote on AI trends.

## Afternoon Networking

Met Prof. Johnson and discussed potential collaborations.

## Dinner

Group dinner at a nice restaurant downtown.
